revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_WraithFX3'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawns up to 14 {{Class|WraithFX3}} actors within 4 map units of the calling actor. The particles will be spawned 4 map units above the calling actor's feet. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Wraith}} and derived classes.
